transcript:
Customer: Hello

Hello?
Hello?
Executive: Haan ji sir.
Customer: Haan ji namaskar sir bataye sir India Mart office se baat kar rahe the.
Customer: To sir abhi maine abhi call ki hai to maine jo manager hai unko lagi hai call aisa kyun sir?
Executive: Haan sir wo call connect hota hai na sir aap customer care pe call karte hai to jo aapka profile handle karte hai unke paas connect hoti hai. To aap customer care se baat kar rahe hai.
Executive: Haan ji main bhi unka senior head baat kar raha hu sir unka call shayad wo receive nahi kiye to maine mere paas aaya sir wo call.
Customer: Achcha achcha. Sir mera problem ye hai dekho meri profile ko teen saal ho gaye.
Executive: Aapka profile teen saal ho gaya okay?
Customer: Ji check kar lijiye aap teen saal ho jayenge. Theek hai. Theek hai. To pehle jo maine is time karaya tha sir aapka ye maine basic pack plan liya tha. Theek hai uske baad me trade seal me gaya main. Trade seal dilaya. Theek hai.
Customer: Uske baad me mera koi mood nahi tha karane ka. To aap logo ki taraf se mujhe bahut cole aayi ki aap kara lo kara lo. Ye Raman sir jo hai jo maine ab manager hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Inke according sir maine kara liya. Inhone bola mujhe ki hum aapko do se teen mahine me business dila ke denge. Aap tension na lo aapka jo bhi matlab paisa lagega wo recover ho jayega.
Customer: To sir abhi itna time ho gaya hamare paas koi dhang ki buylead hi nahi aa rahi us pe. Jo customer aate hai wo bhi nahi dete.
Customer: Nahi. Sir kya hai aap thoda bataiye.
Customer: Ji ji batao batao. Sir sir product jo hamari product category hai na uske according to koi buylead aa hi nahi rahi hai hamare paas. Aur mujhe ye bola gaya tha ki aap plan karaiye agar aapko matlab nahi milta hai na business to do se teen mahine ke andar andar hum aapke paise return kar denge. Return kar denge.
Customer: Ab sir itna time ho gaya main matlab mujhe ye bhi bola gaya tha ki aapko ek ghanta aadha ghanta rozana dena padega. Theek hai main aadha ghanta bhi deta hu buylead dekhta hu sab kuch dekhta hu lekin mere according buylead aa hi nahi rahi sir us par. Koi bhi customer usse juda hi nahi hai.
Executive: Ek kaam kar lete hai.
Customer: Ji. Samajh gaya main aapki baat. Sir ek kaam kar lete hai aapki profile ka proper enrichment again kar lete hai hum log. Theek hai. Abhi hum aapko sir kuch cheeze hai aapke jo hamare jo top supplier hai na India Mart pe unhone jo jo category wagera mention ki hai na sir wo bhi category jaise ki aapki main profile pe dekh pa raha hu MDF box karke aapka ek product hai usme ek hi product dala hua hai aapka. Wahi pe main hamare jo top supplier ka dekh raha hu sir unke me na 13 product dale hue hai.
Executive: 10 to 13 product dale hue hai. Same as it is sir aapke aur bhi jo product categories hai usme kam product aapka dala hua hai. Jisme aapka wooden box hai aapka hai na wooden photos hai aapke. Wooden gift items hai aapke sir. Theek hai. Decorative wooden boxes hai aapke. Theek hai. Clutch bags hai aapke metal hand bags hai dry food tray hai. Ji. Aur wooden bangles hai sir abhi wo sara product category pe na hum abhi number of product add on karte hai abhi hamare jo top profile wale jo supplier hai unse add on dekh ke theek hai. Agar aap usme deal kar rahe hai sir to aap hame please batayenge. Main abhi aapka ek video meeting schedule karwa raha hu aapke manager se aur abhi aapko wo main unko sare cheeze mail pe unko link mujhe bola tha dekhiye suniye ek to late kaam bore hota hai aapke India Mart me mujhe bola main agar koi bhi listing karne deta hu na sir jaise listing kar dijiye do do teen din usme lag jate hai theek hai abhi bhi meri Raman sir se baat hui thi kal kal unko call ki thi maine to unhone bola ki theek hai hum 11 baje aapko connect karte hai subah to sir abhi tak unke 11 nahi baje hai to mujhe is vajah se phir helpline number pe call karne padi. Sir isme delay nahi nahi nahi karna padega sir aapko nahi karna padega wo kar ke denge sir main abhi unko bata deta hu kya kya hai sara cheeze theek hai abhi aapko wo video meeting aapko abhi bhej rahe hai. Main abhi unke samne ja ke bol ke aa raha hu sir.
Customer: Sir main bhi dekhiye business karne ke liye baitha hu agar aise chalega to kaise kaam chalega.

Executive: Na main aapko abhi video meeting me aapko bula raha hu theek hai. Abhi schedule ho rahi hai aapka. Haan aap ek bar join kariye theek hai hum aapko aapke hamare jo top supplier hai unka dikhate hai agar aap usme se sahi aapko kar sakte hai sir to aap usko please aap ek bar dekh lijiyega.
Customer: Sir wo to kar lenge na koi dikkat nahi hai lekin jo hamari main category hai na desi bag desi bag ki to koi buylead usme hai hi nahi theek hai hand desi bag ki leads agar hamare paas aayegi to aapke paas jarur jayegi sir wo agar available hoga hamare paas hum wo bhi check kar lete hai sir. hai hi nahi hai aur Raman sir ne mujhe kuch buylead bhi bheji thi aap inko consume kijiye to wo bolte hai ki humne buylead koi post ki nahi hai.
Executive: Bilkul main samajh gaya aapko wahi keh raha hu main samajh gaya aapka jo aap kehna chah rahe ho to sir aur bhi categories honge aur bhi product line hai jo maine aapko naam bataya jisme ek ek product add hai hum abhi product line aur badha lete hai taki aapke chances badhe sir buyleads aur inquiry generate hone ki right kyuki sir jitne jyada product aapke profile pe hoti hai na to utna hi aapke paas achcha hota hai sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi wo to hai hi sir main wo samajh raha hu aap isse andaza laga lijiye pichli week ki meri maine aath 10 buyleads to consume ki hi nahi hai sir kya karunga consume karke jab aa hi nahi rahi to.
Executive: Nahi main samajh gaya aapki baat isliye to main keh raha hu sir aapko ki number of product badhate hai theek hai to that ki aapke paas reach out badh jayega sir.
Customer: Bahut achchi baat hai.
Executive: Okay to taki taki taki main aapke profile jo hai aur acche se hum enrich kar paye sir. Ek bar aap join kar lo sir ek bar aap dekh lijiye lijiye phir aap iska decision lijiyega.
Customer: Sir hum to join karne ke liye tayar hi hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai sir main abhi aapko bhijwa raha hu abhi aapko theek hai aapke according tayar hai jaise aap bolenge waise karne ke liye tayar hai sir par business to aaye na.
Executive: Bilkul sir main wahi keh raha hu ek bar try kar lete hai sir jo bhi cheeze hum aapko keh rahe hai uske according.
Customer: Ji ji lijiye aap.
summary:
Concerns:

- No relevant buyleads for the past three years.

- Promised business within 2-3 months not delivered.

- Delay in listing new products.

- No buyleads received for the main product category.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to enrich the profile.

- Executive offered a video meeting with the manager.

- Executive assured to increase product line.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will join the video meeting.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, profile, product category, refund, delay
